text:
CDC’s new v-safe tool uses texts & surveys to check in w/ you after you get a #COVID19 #vaccine. Get vaccinated: Go to https://t.co/ecpIp5Nxsw * Click “Get started” *  Fill in your basic info * Verify your smartphone * Add your vaccine info 
#SanAntonio #Schertz #NewBraunfels https://t.co/ydesMyzVwe
